EmailTemplate.description: Use when customer sends PO & PM responds with proforma invoice
EmailTemplate.name: MW_PO Receipt
EmailTemplate.subject: PO Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your PO# {!Opportunity.PO__c}. Please see attached invoice and review for accuracy.
Orders are released upon receipt of payment. Reference your invoice for payment details.
For payment options please refer to the last page of your proforma invoice.
Thank you,
{!Opportunity.Ops_Contact__c}
